segment.source: No-Hitting Bosses\title Defeating a Â¤ level without taking damage will grant you a Challenge Coin!
Pets\title You can create and share your own custom pets on the Steam Workshop! Open the Pet Maker from the Pause Menu to start creating!
Buying Upgrades\title You can purchase useful upgrades in the shop! The shop can be accessed anytime in the World Map.
Visiting Home\title Welcome to Forever Fall Forest! You can now return to Cornucopia Town anytime.
Enjoying the game?\title We would love to hear what you think about our game so far! Please leave a review on Steam and let us know your thoughts - we really appreciate it. No pressure, though!
